page.title: 12Advantages,Brickhill,Bedford
page.content: The following advantages were given in the survey of 200 families:- { { Nearness to A.1. & M.1. roads....33 { On main railway line.............27 { Nearness to open countryside.....59 { Good schools nearby..............49 { Good shops in town and locally...33 { Town parks/swimming pool nearby..25 { R.Ouse Embankment/trees in town..21 { Friendly community................5 { Local amenities for children.....11 { Nearness to East Coast............3 { Good variety of employment........3 { Local services good...............3 { Warmer climate....................1 { Stable community..................2 { Cycle track to town...............2 { Good free Press...................2 { Nearness to relatives.............1 { No comment was made by 59 families.
